title: [SDMP 0.10.1](http://sdmp.github.io/) Node Information Resource Schema
description: Schema for the node information resources of the SDMP.

node.description: Root property which stores information about a node.

name.description: A human-readable name for the node.

ips.description: IP and port which are used to connect to the node.

items.description: The IPv4 or IPv6 address, including the port.
